channel.title: Inference — AI Newsletter
channel.description: The signal in the noise. Curated AI trends, tools, and research — updated every Monday.

item.title: OpenAI disbands mission alignment team, which focused on ‘safe’ and ‘trustworthy’ AI development
item.description: The OpenAI news is worth a closer look for teams making near-term tool or vendor calls (via TechCrunch AI).

item.title: Transformers.js v4 Preview: Now Available on NPM!
item.description: A fresh release of Transformers.js v4 is now available for teams ready to evaluate alternatives (via Hugging Face Blog).
